description: The action to apply a guardrail. For troubleshooting some of the common errors you might encounter when using the ApplyGuardrail API, see Troubleshooting Amazon Bedrock API Error Codes in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide.

parameters.name: guardrailIdentifier
parameters.description: The guardrail identifier used in the request to apply the guardrail.

parameters.name: guardrailVersion
parameters.description: The guardrail version used in the request to apply the guardrail.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The source of data used in the request to apply the guardrail.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The content details used in the request to apply the guardrail. (dict) --- The content block to be evaluated by the guardrail. text (dict) --- Text within content block to be evaluated by the guardrail. The input text details to be evaluated by the guardrail. qualifiers (list) --- The qualifiers describing the text block. (string) --- image (dict) --- Image within guardrail content block to be evaluated by the guardrail. The format details for the file type of the image blocked by the guardrail. The image source (image bytes) details of the image blocked by the guardrail. bytes (bytes) --- The bytes details of the guardrail image source. Object used in independent api.

nested_params.name: text
nested_params.description: Text within content block to be evaluated by the guardrail.

nested_params.name: text
nested_params.description: The input text details to be evaluated by the guardrail.

nested_params.name: qualifiers
nested_params.description: The qualifiers describing the text block.

nested_params.name: image
nested_params.description: Image within guardrail content block to be evaluated by the guardrail.

nested_params.name: format
nested_params.description: The format details for the file type of the image blocked by the guardrail.

nested_params.name: source
nested_params.description: The image source (image bytes) details of the image blocked by the guardrail.

nested_params.name: bytes
nested_params.description: The bytes details of the guardrail image source. Object used in independent api.

parameters.name: outputScope
parameters.description: Specifies the scope of the output that you get in the response. Set to FULL to return the entire output, including any detected and non-detected entries in the response for enhanced debugging. Note that the full output scope doesn't apply to word filters or regex in sensitive information filters. It does apply to all other filtering policies, including sensitive information with filters that can detect personally identifiable information (PII).

nested_items.name: topicPolicyUnits
nested_items.description: The topic policy units processed by the guardrail.

nested_items.description: The content policy units processed by the guardrail.

nested_items.name: wordPolicyUnits
nested_items.description: The word policy units processed by the guardrail.

nested_items.description: The sensitive information policy units processed by the guardrail.

nested_items.name: sensitiveInformationPolicyFreeUnits
nested_items.description: The sensitive information policy free units processed by the guardrail.

nested_items.description: The contextual grounding policy units processed by the guardrail.

nested_items.name: contentPolicyImageUnits
nested_items.description: The content policy image units processed by the guardrail.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action taken in the response from the guardrail.

nested_items.name: actionReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the action taken when harmful content is detected.

nested_items.name: outputs
nested_items.description: The output details in the response from the guardrail.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The specific text for the output content produced by the guardrail.

nested_items.name: assessments
nested_items.description: The assessment details in the response from the guardrail.

nested_items.name: topicPolicy
nested_items.description: The topic policy.

nested_items.name: topics
nested_items.description: The topics in the assessment.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name for the guardrail.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type behavior that the guardrail should perform when the model detects the topic.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action the guardrail should take when it intervenes on a topic.

nested_items.name: detected
nested_items.description: Indicates whether topic content that breaches the guardrail configuration is detected.

nested_items.name: contentPolicy
nested_items.description: The content policy.

nested_items.name: filters
nested_items.description: The content policy filters.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The guardrail type.

nested_items.name: confidence
nested_items.description: The guardrail confidence.

nested_items.name: filterStrength
nested_items.description: The filter strength setting for the guardrail content filter.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The guardrail action.

nested_items.name: detected
nested_items.description: Indicates whether content that breaches the guardrail configuration is detected.

nested_items.name: wordPolicy
nested_items.description: The word policy.

nested_items.name: customWords
nested_items.description: Custom words in the assessment.

nested_items.name: match
nested_items.description: The match for the custom word.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action for the custom word.

nested_items.name: detected
nested_items.description: Indicates whether custom word content that breaches the guardrail configuration is detected.

nested_items.name: managedWordLists
nested_items.description: Managed word lists in the assessment.

nested_items.description: The match for the managed word.

nested_items.description: The type for the managed word.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action for the managed word.

nested_items.name: detected
nested_items.description: Indicates whether managed word content that breaches the guardrail configuration is detected.

nested_items.description: The sensitive information policy.

nested_items.description: The PII entities in the assessment.

nested_items.description: The PII entity filter action.

nested_items.name: detected
nested_items.description: Indicates whether personally identifiable information (PII) that breaches the guardrail configuration is detected.

nested_items.description: The regex queries in the assessment.

nested_items.description: The regex filter name.

nested_items.description: The regesx filter match.

nested_items.name: regex
nested_items.description: The regex query.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The region filter action.

nested_items.name: detected
nested_items.description: Indicates whether custom regex entities that breach the guardrail configuration are detected.

nested_items.name: contextualGroundingPolicy
nested_items.description: The contextual grounding policy used for the guardrail assessment.

nested_items.name: filters
nested_items.description: The filter details for the guardrails contextual grounding filter.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The contextual grounding filter type.

nested_items.name: threshold
nested_items.description: The threshold used by contextual grounding filter to determine whether the content is grounded or not.

nested_items.name: score
nested_items.description: The score generated by contextual grounding filter.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action performed by the guardrails contextual grounding filter.

nested_items.name: detected
nested_items.description: Indicates whether content that fails the contextual grounding evaluation (grounding or relevance score less than the corresponding threshold) was detected.

nested_items.description: The invocation metrics for the guardrail assessment.

nested_items.description: The processing latency details for the guardrail invocation metrics.

nested_items.description: The topic policy units processed by the guardrail.

nested_items.description: The total text characters by the guardrail coverage.

nested_items.description: The count (integer) of images guardrails guarded.

nested_items.name: total
nested_items.description: Represents the total number of images (integer) that were in the request (guarded and unguarded).
